original: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘chattassa tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṁ vadesi, katamāni tāni tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?
analyzed: bhante nāgasena chattassa tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbāni iti yam vadesi katamāni tāni tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbāni iti
yathā mahā rāja chattam upari carati

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena kilesānaṁ upari muddhani carena bhavitabbaṁ.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena kilesānam upari muddhani carena

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, chattassa paṭhamaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: ida mahā rāja chattassa paṭhamam aṅgam

original: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, chattaṁ muddhanupatthambhaṁ hoti;
analyzed: puna capara mahā rāja chattam hoti

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena yoniso manasikārupatthambhena bhavitabbaṁ.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena yonisas manasikāru patthambhena

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, chattassa dutiyaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: ida mahā rāja chattassa dutiyam aṅgam

original: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, chattaṁ vātātapameghavuṭṭhiyo paṭihanati;
analyzed: puna capara mahā rāja chattam vāta ātapa megha vuṭṭhiyaḥ paṭihanati

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena nānāvidhadiṭṭhiputhusamaṇabrāhmaṇānaṁ matavāta-tividhaggisantāpakilesavuṭṭhiyo paṭihantabbā.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena nānāvidha diṭṭhi puthu samaṇa brāhmaṇānam mata vātati vidhaggi santāpa kilesa vuṭṭhiyaḥ paṭihantabbā

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, chattassa tatiyaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: idam mahā rāja chattassa tatiyam aṅgam
mahā rāja therena sāriputtena dhamma senāpatinā
